title: What are the best books to learn about batteries, how they are made, and the technical challenges and solutions? - Quora

response.answer_text: Muthuramakrishnan Venkatakrishnan provided a recommendation but I wanted to add that battery technology is evolving so this is one of these cases where in addition to good reference, you should also check out online sources.
Linden's handbook of batteriesLinden's Handbook of Batteries, 4th Edition: Thomas Reddy: 9780071624213: Amazon.com: Books
